channel.title: SDK Web Changelog
channel.description: Latest updates to the SDK Web Changelog

item.title: Onboarding SDK: Latest 3.0.1 - 2025/03/27
item.description:
ðŸš€ New Features & Improvements
  • Added a new message handler to indicate the success, failure, or exit of the SDK process. Includes details about the step where the event occurred and a code describing the situation
  • Extended challenge configuration to support screenshot handling with adjustable compression rates.
  • Updated challenge configuration to include video handling with dynamic resolution adjustments
  • Improved document scanning feedback with clearer error messages and enhanced user guidance
  • Improved challenge handling with dynamic resolution switching
  • Added a new transition overlay to enhance visual effects during animations
  • Updated video resolution settings to 1080p for improved quality
ðŸ›  Fixes
  • Ensured timestamp is only updated when the media recorder is inactive to avoid inaccuracies
  • Adjusted video constraints to use dynamic screenshot resolution
  • Removed Polish language support from multilingual translations

item.title: Authenticate SDK: Latest 3.0.4 - 2025/04/04
item.description:
ðŸš€ New Features & Improvements
  • The SDK now automatically adjusts to fill the full width of the visible screen
ðŸ›  Fixes

item.title: Authenticate SDK: 3.0.2 - 2025/02/17
item.description:
ðŸš€ New Features & Improvements
  • Improved smile detection logic to avoid black screen issues during liveness checks
  • Added a network status indicator
  • An orange icon appears when a request takes longer than expected, and turns red if the issue persists.
  • Improved reliability of background processes to reduce visible errors
  • Removed the close button from the SDK
ðŸ›  Fixes
  • Improved layout responsiveness on desktop screens
  • A default error message is now shown when the SDK receives an unexpected state
